title: Ineligible Duo Partner (but we are both silver?)
body: Title i keep getting this bug on old client and only way to paly with friends is new client can i fix this??

replies.body: Weird!  Has your friend placed yet?  You guys need to get placed, so anything you placed last season won't count towards grouping together.  Also, make sure ya'll are not suspended.  :X  Hope that helps!

hi queen i know this is rly old but yeah one of us has to be on the new client to inv

im silver and hes silver
